about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all Autumn 2021 Garden decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
- Tickseed Flower Bushes
- Golden Maple Trees
- Cheeky Scarecrow
- Garden Haystack
- Purple Flower Barrel
- Edging Pumpkins
- Wooden Ranch Fence
- Icelandic Rug
- Autumn Patio Deck
- Autumn Stepping Stones

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
detailed_description:
Don't want to grind? Get all Autumn 2021 Garden decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
- Tickseed Flower Bushes
- Golden Maple Trees
- Cheeky Scarecrow
- Garden Haystack
- Purple Flower Barrel
- Edging Pumpkins
- Wooden Ranch Fence
- Icelandic Rug
- Autumn Patio Deck
- Autumn Stepping Stones

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
